title: S.5 - Laken Riley Act
summary: This bill requires the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) to detain certain non-U.S. nationals (aliens under federal law) who have been arrested for burglary, theft, larceny, or shoplifting. The bill also authorizes states to sue the federal government for decisions or alleged failures related to immigration enforcement.

title: H.R.7888 - Reforming Intelligence and Securing America Act
summary: This bill reauthorizes Title VII of the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act (FISA) for five years and makes changes to FISA, including certain restrictions on surveillance under Section 702.

title: H.R.6968 - Ending Importation of Russian Oil Act
summary: This bill prohibits the importation of energy products from Russia.
